meanings.definition: A person who makes something less extreme or intense.
meanings.sent1: As a tamer of conflicts, he always found a peaceful solution to disagreements.
meanings.sent2: The negotiator acted as a tamer, reducing tensions between the two parties.
meanings.sent3: Her calming presence acted as a tamer, diffusing the heated argument in the room.
meanings.sent4: The wise leader was a tamer of emotions, bringing harmony to the group.
